name: Project1 (cdart55)
description:
A simple game that I took from a tutorial on and expanded it by adding graphics and other minor tweaks.  I was shocked to find out how easy it was to go from basic shapes (triangles, squares, and a circle) to a more aesthetically pleasing look.

I would like to encourage anybody who is just starting out to just make a simple game.  Make a game with just the basic shapes (Gray Boxing) and then later add in the graphics.  I found it made things much easier.

Thank you for playing this simple little thing.
